body.name: Bambaw Non-insulated Water Bottle 32oz, Blue Water Bottle with Handle, Stainless Steel Single Wall Water Bottle Dishwasher Safe, 1 Liter Water Bottles Reusable, Large Water Bottle – Aegean Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 36 mins
features: Eco & health conscious: Crafted from durable 304 stainless steel, our 32 oz water bottles are BPA-free, rust-proof, and leak-proof. Say goodbye to plastic and enjoy safe hydration with this eco-friendly blue bottle.
Camp-boiling-proof: A must-have for outdoor lovers, the Bambaw stainless steel water bottles are featherlight and boil-proof. Make it your hydration partner on all your adventures!
Big opening: Large enough to hold ice cubes or a tea infuser, the wide opening of the Bambaw 32oz water bottles also makes it easy to enjoy a variety of delightful drinks.
Easy to clean: With its spacious neck design, our 32 oz water bottle stainless steel offers simple maintenance. You can clearly see inside and reach every corner with a bottle brush.
Signature colors: Choose from 10 unique shades. Add a pop of color to your daily hydration routine!
No more plastic taste: Water in steel might taste different than in plastic. Prepare your palate for this healthier change.
body.description: Make the switch to a 32oz water bottle! Every year, millions of tonnes of plastic waste end up in nature and in our oceans. Our throwaway culture has become a serious environmental problem, harming wildlife and ecosystems. “Every minute, one million plastic bottles are bought worldwide”.Replacing disposable plastic bottles by a high-quality navy blue water bottle is a simple swap with a huge impact.Stop drinking plastic water, it’s toxic!Harmful chemicals in plastic blend with water. Therefore, drinking water should never be in contact with plastic, not even a plastic lid! Even bottled water isn’t safe anymore.According to the latest research of the World Health Organization, 90% of bottled water contains microplastics*.A minimalistic design for a water bottle 1 liter made to last!This Bambaw metal water bottle is made of natural polished stainless steel. No logo has been added on these stainless steel water bottles with handle. Whether you're going to work, hiking, the gym, practising yoga or travelling, bring your Bambaw metal waterbottle along.Why the Bambaw big metal water bottle?Easy to Clean: The wide opening enables an in-depth cleaning of the water bottle leakproof.Leak Proof: The sturdy lid makes spilling impossible.Economical: A reusable wide mouth bottle will save you money in the long term.BPA-free: Stop ingesting BPA or microplastic by using a stainless steel water bottle 32 oz.A simple solution to plastic pollution!*WHO launches health review after microplastics found in 90% of bottled water, The Guardian, Thu 15 Mar 2018 ⚠The only plastic part of the light weight water bottle is the rubber seal, which isn’t in contact with water and makes the stainless steel water bottle 34oz leakproof.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars At least, the perfect bottle
reviews.reviewText: I love this so much, I have since purchased more in other sizes. I'm constantly on the look out for water bottles, but it feels as if my quest has reached its conclusion. This is a great bottle from top to bottom. The metal keeps my drinks cool and crisp tasting, the size is perfect, the wide mouth is easy to drink from, the lid is super sturdy and secure. Stylish, functional, well made, and reasonably priced. The only thing I wish it had would be some sort of strap for the lid, just to keep it with the bottle when unscrewed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent! Will buy more.
reviews.reviewText: Single walled canteen, exactly what I was looking for. Durable, solid cap, perfect for my outback kit. I will buy more soon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars High Quality Stainless Water Bottle
reviews.reviewText: This is a great1 liter water bottle. Both the bottle and the top are made of stainless steel, as is the handy wire bale that acts as a handle for the unit. There is a bamboo wood decorative plug glued to the steel lid; it seems pretty tough. The advantage of this bottle over some others is that the bare steel allows you to stick it in a fire for boiling water or putting it in the ashes to keep the water from freezing in cold weather. The bottle is uninsulated, so it will not keep liquids hot or cold, and it will "sweat" in warm weather if you put ice into the bottle; the opening is wide enough to do this. One unexpectedly good feature of this water bottle is the packaging. The box is obviously recycled material, and Bambaw claims that the item is made sustainably in the PRC, along with some "zero waste" stickers. This is a plus on an already great product. I am quite impressed. --Ed

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great so far!
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my teen to bring to school to keep water in. This fits in the pocket of her bag easily. It is sturdy. Easy to clean. If you don't need an insulated thermos this is great. It doesn't leak. So far so good.

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good, but the top is a bit squeaky.
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good water bottle with a trustable handle, big mouth piece, detailed carving, and stainless steel. The cap is easy to screw on and off and is trusted with a handle, but has a very squeaky sound when you screw it on and off. Good water bottle anyway.
Also, gets a bonus point since it lacks leds and microchips. C.

Nach all den Jahren in Dauerbenutzung war diese Trinkflasche wahrscheinlich eine meiner besten Investitionen in ein Produkt. Die Trinkflasche lässt sich sehr gut reinigen, ist wasserdicht und ist hochwertig verarbeitet. Klare Kaufempfehlung!

It has a horrible smell and taste (metal) ...- I have put it in a dish water- Filled it with hot water and lemon juice and left it over night- Filled it with hot water and apple cider vinegar and left it over nightIt all helped a bit but after a day or two the horrible smell came backThe smell is not the problem but it also gives the water a bad tasteI have bought other bottles before and they didn't have this... Sad.

reviews.reviewTitle: Ottimo prodotto per qualità e prezzo 🎋
reviews.reviewText: Un prodotto meraviglioso per tenere al fresco o caldo le proprie bibite. La uso quando devo uscire a farmi una camminata dove mi porto una tisana calda da bere al parco. Il prezzo è molto bene, consiglio di lavarla ogni giorno perchè dopo averla utilizzata.Insieme all'acqua metto alcune volte anche minerali e vitamine come Magnesio, potassio e sodio. Alcune volte Vitamina. Prendersi cura di sé stessi è fondamentale, per questo oltre ad idratarsi consiglio di prendere vitamine, per me il magnesio è stata la svolta. Assolutamente.Per guarire da qualsiasi trauma o situazione bisogna lavorare sul proprio sistema immunitario e sistema nervoso. per questo camminare molto aiuta oltre alla scrittura. La scrittura aiuta a liberarsi dalle energie e pensieri negativi. Ogni volta che vi sentite negative riempite la borraccia e uscite a camminare. la vostra mente si svuoterà e tornerete spensierati. Ovviamente ci sono alcune cose che si possono fare per guarire.Per ogni percorso di guarigione bisogna lavorare anche sulle proprie emozioni. La' fuori ci sono un sacco di video e libri che possono aiutarvi a farlo. Soprattutto in inglese. Un libro che a me ha aiutato molto è stato questo: "Andrà tutto bene te lo giuro" di Faouzi Zouhair. E' un libro suddiviso in riflessioni di argomenti vari tra cui Amore, amicizia, guarigione, libertà, soldi, depressione ecc. è un libro che libera tutti i nodi emozionali. Lo consiglio a chi vuole lavorare su sé stesso e guarire da ogni trauma del passato, non è facile ma è un percorso davvero liberatorio e che può aiuta anche le relazioni.Detto questo consiglio questa borraccia perché dopo un anno la utilizzo tutt'ora durante i miei viaggi. 🍃🍂🍃🍂

En general muy bien, es estanca, resistente y de buena calidad, califico con 3 estrellas el sabor, porque dentro bien, pero si como yo, la utilizas en el trabajo (taller) ya hace tiempo que sabe como a aluminio u óxido (el borde exterior) aunque no tiene marcas
